movies.title: Young Person's Guide to Cinema
movies.originalTitle: Seishônen no tame no eiga nyûmon
movies.plot: Three experimental films which run simultaneously. The subject matter is colorful and provocative.
movies.simplePlot: Three experimental films which run simultaneously. The subject matter is colorful and provocative.

biography.bio: Henrikku Morisaki is known for his work on Pastoral Hide and Seek (1974), Collections privées (1979) and Young Person's Guide to Cinema (1974).
biography.name: Henrikku Morisaki

biography.bio: Masahiro Saito was born as Masanori Saito. He is an actor, known for Throw Away Your Books, Rally in the Streets (1971), Pastoral Hide and Seek (1974) and Young Person's Guide to Cinema (1974).
biography.name: Masahiro Saito

biography.bio: Sueshi Sasada is an actor, known for Labyrinth Tale (1975), Pastoral Hide and Seek (1974) and Young Person's Guide to Cinema (1974).
biography.name: Sueshi Sasada
